heroHook: Lucas stared at the empty ChatGPT chat window. Twenty minutes ago, she'd been deep in a productive conversation about technical architecture. Now? Blank slate. No memory. No context. Same project, same person, completely different AI — or at least that's how it felt. This is the "how to keep chatgpt from forgetting" problem, and it affects every serious AI user.
